description: corrected both guitars until Verse I and the beginning bass line. The drums seem to have some sort of problem caused by the way Guitar Pro interpreted the old file from 2016.
title: Carry

description: only corrected Guitar 1 in Bridge 1 and Bridge 2 but there are probably more corrections to do. In live videos you can clearly see that Aaron plays Bridge 1 exclusively using the 5th string. Also, from live videos it is also possible to see that, in order to play Bridge 2 as he plays it, the 1st string must be tuned to B.
title: Carry
